answers.answer: pregnancy. We gain weight more rapidly towards the end
I think its because the baby grows the quickest during this time....so thats what ive been told by . My midwife :)

That just happened to me! I'm 34 weeks ando I gained 7 lbs in two weeks but doctor told me that was good since I haven't gained much until now. It's the same for me I haven't changed my diet either, well I can't since I have diabetes. She said ill still gain more cause baby gains about 1/2 lb a week until birth and my baby girl is weighing in at over 5 lbs already!!

question: I went to the doctors for me 36 week appointment and when I got on the scale I had gained 6 pounds within 2 weeks since my last visit.This last week I had gained 1 pound.why did I jump so high in my weight?My eating hasn't changed either has my drinking.I drink water and juice and a soda once in awhile.And all my test I have had done have been perfect.Anyone else have this problem?
title: 37 almost 38 weeks and I have been gaining lots of weight fast!
